sentence.Network_en: This homogenization simplifies and uncomplicated the world enough to model It'sanely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种均质化的处理方式,简化了世界,足以能够稳妥地为它建模.

sentence.Network_en: She is behaving rather sanely these days even though we know she is schizophrenic.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管我们知道她有精神分裂症,但那些天她的举止还算清醒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国大学翻译中文57 - DuSystem Forum... ... 稳健主义 centrism 稳健地 sanely 稳健性 robustness.
adj.(形容词)sanely adv. 神志正常地；明智地缩略词
he acted sensibly in the crisis ; speak more sanely about these affairs ; acted quite reasonably .在关键时刻他做出了明智之举；头脑清醒地谈起那些事情；举止得当。
sanel 萨内尔, sanely 心智健全地, sanell 萨内尔

list.abs: no sane person would give up antibi-otics and anesthesia , farming and the written word .心智正常的人是不会放弃抗生素、麻醉术、种植养殖和书面文字的。
you must humble yourself before you can become sane .'你先要知道自卑，然后才能神志健全。”
allover the world market . our products with high quality , sane price and thoughtful post selling service give out all our clients with keen competition .本公司一流品质、合理价格完善服务热情奉献给海内外新老顾客并不懈努力提升客户的竞争能力。
The depressed disease that sane person meets ?, 理智的人会的抑郁症吗?
he is a very sane person ., 他是一个很有头脑的人.

means.word_mean: 1. with good sense or in a reasonable or intelligent manner;
2. in a sane or lucid manner;
